com.mesosphere.sdk.framework

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.framework.Driver

  • public final class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides global access to a SchedulerDriver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SchedulerDriver getInstance()
      Returns the configured SchedulerDriver client object, or throws an IllegalStateException if no driver object is available.
      static void setDriver(SchedulerDriver driver)
      Assigns the driver object to be returned by calls to getInstance().

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SchedulerDriver getInstance()
        Returns the configured SchedulerDriver client object, or throws an IllegalStateException if no driver object is available. The returned Driver object should not be retained by the caller, as it may be replaced in the event of a re-registration.

      • setDriver

        public static void setDriver(SchedulerDriver driver)
        Assigns the driver object to be returned by calls to getInstance(). In practice, this should be invoked when the scheduler first registers with Mesos, and/or following a re-registration.
